title: raama ragukula (swarajathi)
sahitya:
rAmA raghukula sudhAbdhi sOma dahsaratha rAja hrdaya kamala dIna 
rAja budhajana hrdaya virAjita pada rAja dinakara rakSakana grNAbharaNa

anupallavi

 mAmava ramAvara mamArti hara mAmakAbhISTada mAkrta paricaraNA caraNA 
shrta munisharaNA sharaNAgata bhaya shamanA shama nArinuta nAma pAvana

caraNam

 shrI raghukula tilaka sudhArasa gaLita vacana pAra rahita ghOra kaluSa vAraNa 
trijagada vana caNa nIrajadaLa nibha caraNa krpArasa vikasita su-nayana sanAtana
paripUrNa ghana ghOra bhava vanadhi taraNa sArasa sama lOcana bhavya suguNa
dAyaka sunAma sIta kiraNakulajA ramaNa sudhAkara vadana shrita jana pOSaNa
surAbhaya shubha dAyaka sadA gatija kara dhrta pada kamala rAmacandrapurAdi
dAna mudAspada mamagu kurUpa narApaghana raghu
